seed_pair.english: 他们想花更多的时间作为一个小组聚会。
seed_pair.mandarin: They want to spend more time meeting as a group.

recent_seed_pairs.english: 我的朋友过去在办公室工作。
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: My friend used to work in an office.

recent_seed_pairs.english: 他们说他们想确保我们及时完成所有事情。
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: They say they want to make sure that we finish everything in time.

recent_seed_pairs.english: 我们想知道会发生什么。
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: We wanted to know what was going to happen.

recent_seed_pairs.english: 没有人确定如何回答这个问题。
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: Nobody was sure how to answer the question.

recent_seed_pairs.english: 如果我要求你帮助我，你会做什么？
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: What would you do if I asked you to help me?

recent_seed_pairs.english: 我想让她帮你处理安排。
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: I wanted her to help you to deal with the arrangements.

recent_seed_pairs.english: 我忘记了我试图说的词。
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: I've forgotten the word I was trying to say.

recent_seed_pairs.english: 我喜欢有机会和你练习说话。
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: I enjoy the chance to practise speaking with you.

recent_seed_pairs.english: 你已经做了你需要做的事。
recent_seed_pairs.mandarin: You've done what you needed to do.
I didn't want to ask you how to say it.

recent_new_legos.english: help you to deal with the arrangements
the word I was trying to say
the chance to practise speaking with you
to ask you how to say it
to ask you how to say
